abstract: Top company executives, painting a rosy financial picture for the future, told investors the bid was far too low.
snippet: Top company executives, painting a rosy financial picture for the future, told investors the bid was far too low.
lead_paragraph: The biotechnology company Genzyme argued strenuously on Friday that it was worth far more than the $18.5 billion that the French drug maker Sanofi-Aventis was offering in a hostile bid.

headline.main: Genzyme Investors Are Urged to Reject Sanofi Offer as Too Low
headline.print_headline: Genzyme Investors Are Urged to Reject Sanofi Offer as Too Low
